upgrades.name: Home Base
upgrades.tooltip: Creates a home base where harvesters can return to deposit gems.

upgrades.name: Harvester Count
upgrades.tooltip: The number of active harvester out collecting gems.

upgrades.name: Harvester Speed
upgrades.tooltip: Increase the movement speed of harvesters.

upgrades.name: Harvester Collection Range
upgrades.tooltip: The radius around each harvester in which it can collect gems.

upgrades.name: Harvester Capacity
upgrades.tooltip: The maximum number of gems each harvester can carry before returning to base.

upgrades.name: Harvester Maximum Fuel
upgrades.tooltip: The maximum fuel capacity of each harvester.

upgrades.name: Harvester Refuel Speed
upgrades.tooltip: The speed at which each harvester refuels.

upgrades.name: Gem Value
upgrades.tooltip: The value of each gem collected by harvesters.

upgrades.name: Gem Spawn Cooldown
upgrades.tooltip: Determines how often gems spawn in the world.

upgrades.name: Gem Spawn Rate
upgrades.tooltip: The number of gems that spawn each cooldown period.

upgrades.name: Max Gem Count
upgrades.tooltip: The maximum number of gems that can exist in the world at once.

upgrades.name: Starting Gem Count
upgrades.tooltip: The number of gems present in the world at the start of the game.

upgrades.name: Camera Zoom Scale
upgrades.tooltip: The zoom scale of the camera.

upgrades.name: Auto Refuel
upgrades.tooltip: If enabled, harvesters will automatically refuel when low on fuel.

upgrades.name: Refuel at Homebase
upgrades.tooltip: If enabled, harvesters will refuel at the homebase.

upgrades.name: Fuel Efficiency
upgrades.tooltip: The fuel efficiency multiplier for harvesters.

upgrades.name: Homebase Collector
upgrades.tooltip: If enabled, the homebase will automatically collect gems within its collection range.

upgrades.name: Homebase Collection Range
upgrades.tooltip: The radius around the homebase in which it can collect gems.
